participant_1.background:
My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing.
i will one day own a ferret.
My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.
I pretended to be a superhero with my kids and they loved it.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

participant_2.background:
My parents are very supportive of me, and they always encourage me to make healthy choices.
I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.
i started working at google last week on self driving car research.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I just started working at Google last week on self driving car research.
That sounds really exciting! Do you like it so far?
It is really interesting! I am still learning a lot, but I am excited to be a part of this project.
That is great! I am sure you will do great things.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
What are your favorite fruits?
I love watermelon and mango. They are both so sweet and refreshing.
Watermelon is my favorite too! I love how it is so juicy and sweet.
Me too! I can eat a whole watermelon by myself.
Wow! I am not that big of a fan of mangos, but I do like them.
They are not for everyone. I love the tropical flavor.
I like to pretend to be a superhero with my kids. They love it!
That is so sweet! I bet they love it when you do that.
They do! It is always fun to see their imaginations come to life.
I am sure! I volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.
That is great! I bet you are a great role model for him.
I try to be! I want to make sure he has a good experience in scouting.
I am sure he does! You sound like a great parent.
Thank you! I appreciate that
